avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow in the area but the remaining snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow in the area. The remaining snow is considered mostly stable after freeze/thaw cycles.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg norðaustlæg eða breytileg átt á þriðjudag, léttskýjað og frost 0 til 4 stig. Úrkomulítið fram á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is snow in the mountains but considered mostly stable. Small slabs can be present in gullies and high elevations, but trigger is unlikely.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has accumulated in gullies and wind slabs can be present high in starting zones and just below ridges. The snow is though generally stiff and considered stable and avalanches are unlikely. Little snow is at lower elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Þurrt og rólegt veður á þriðjudag og miðvikudag, hægur vindur og vægt frost. Hlýnar á fimmtudag með sunnanátt og rigningu til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.highlights: A thin cover of snow is on top of older snow which is generally considered stable after freeze/thaw cycles.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A little light new snow is on top of old stiff snow that is generally considered stable. Little snow is at low elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Aðgerðalítið veður næstu daga, frost, þurrt og hægur vindur. Hlýnar þegar líður á fimmtudag með smá vætu.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Small, unstable wind slabs may be present, especially high in the mountains, in gullies and below ridgelines, mainly on south-facing aspects. The snow is though mostly considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A little new snow has accumulated over the past week, with snow drift from northerly winds. Small wind slabs have formed in gullies and depressions, and may be unstable in steep terrain. Most snow is though considered stable, with the older snowpack firm and the recent snow generally well bonded to it.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable. Wind slabs could be present in the Eastfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Aðgerðalítið veður næstu daga, frost, þurrt og hægur vindur. Hlýnar þegar líður á fimmtudag með smá vætu.
